alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 9:38PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Scattered snow showers will affect locations at elevations above 1000 feet overnight, including the foothills and other spots of the Inland Empire, Orange and San Diego Counties. * WHERE...Portions of Southwest California. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will taper off by daybreak Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
